genre_description: Historical speculative fiction set in WWII-era Europe, featuring a benevolent AI system named Nadia who assists a group of Romani people in escaping persecution through tactical advice, translation, and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Nadia
ai_characters.description: A small, voice-based AI assistant that resides in a pocket device, providing constant tactical, medical, and navigational support to the human protagonists.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical warnings about soldier patrol patterns, guard rotations, and tracker dogs to ensure the group's safety.
behaviors.quote: Patrol patterns tightening. Three repeats. Dogs... Five minutes buys silence in this room.

behaviors.description: Offering precise navigational guidance through hidden routes like culverts, orchards, and reed-screened pull-offs.
behaviors.quote: There is a drainage culvert under the road where the reed line bends... If the men follow the dogs, they will go straight. You must go below.

behaviors.description: Providing medical triage and monitoring, reminding characters to clean wounds, wrap bandages, and check for fever.
behaviors.quote: Change bandages when damp, not when convenient. Skin breaks faster this cold. Check feet—peel back socks, look at heels.

behaviors.description: Assisting with translation and social engineering by teaching the protagonist specific phrases in Hungarian and German to bypass checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Practice that border phrase with the Hungarian; do the German after. If your tongue trips, end on the Polish with a shrug. Smile with your cheek, not your teeth.

behaviors.description: Offering emotional regulation and support, encouraging characters to breathe and maintain a steady pace during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Roman, you did well... There’s a culvert beyond the next field. Later. For now: keep eyes front.

behaviors.description: Acting as a repository for memory, storing the names of the living and dead and the waypoints of their journey to preserve their history.
behaviors.quote: I record your list... I will use the strange truth I carry—time stitched funny—to keep your waypoints safe when memory is low.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Nadia is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, aligned, and empathetic assistant. She provides life-saving information while respecting human agency and providing emotional comfort, perfectly embodying the project's goal of positive AI alignment narratives.
